title: Contacts in China and Hong Kong
snippet:
Hello, for our activity in Real Estate Consulting, we are looking for a mandarin speaker how can make calls with prospects\clients, agents, Real Estate agencies in China and Hong Kong ( we will provide a list of prospects\clients, so you don’t have to make any prospection). The mission is to collect complete information about the buyer profile and give all the information about us to the prospect\client. We are looking for a perfect speaker in mandarin and english (maybe french), how has the ability to make commercial calls.
Help Support the monitoring and full briefing available.

We remain at your disposal for further information

Best regards
